#Make new slot, stored in accessory address minus 3
00707571 = 83 F8 02 74 03 83 EA 03 8B 45 FC 31 C9 8D 44 10 1E 8A 08 80 E1 FF 89 4D DC 30 08 90 8A 4D E8 08 08 90 90 8B 55 DC 80 FA FF 74 18

#Add extra acc slot in status screen
00704666 = 83 C1 43 51 E8 94 14 FF FF 83 C4 10 90 90 90 90 90 6A 07 8B 55 F8 69 D2 84 00 00 00 8B 45 FC 33 C9 8A 4C 10 1D 81 C1 00 01 00 00 51 E8 84 24 FC FF 83 C4 04 50 8B 55 0C 83 C2 40 52 8B 45 08 83 C0 43 50 E8 55 14 FF FF 83 C4 10 31 DB 8B 4D F8 69 C9 84 00 00 00 8B 55 FC 31 C0 29 DA 8A 44 11 1E 3C FF 75 16 85 DB 75 47 B3 03 EB E0 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 6A 07 05 20 01 00 00 50 E8 2D 24 FC FF 83 C4 04 50 8B 4D 0C 83 C1 7F 85 DB 74 03 83 C1 20 90 90 90 90 90 51 8B 55 08 83 C2 43 52 E8 F2 13 FF FF 83 C4 10 EB B5 6A 05 68 19 09 92 00 8B 45 0C 50 FF 75 08 E8 DA 13 FF FF 83 C4 10 6A 05 68 28 09 92 00 8B 55 0C 83 C2 40 52 FF 75 08 E8 C1 13 FF FF 83 C4 10 6A 05 68 37 09 92 00 8B 4D 0C 83 C1 7F 51 FF 75 08 E8 A8 13 FF FF 58 FF 75 08 83 44 24 04 20 83 6C 24 08 04
